Name: Memory Maze
About the game: Memory Maze is a new maze game with an original concept. Designed for all types of players and all ages. Get to the end of the maze as fast as you can by memorizing the path. But be careful! The walls of the maze disappear from the screen after a short period of time! Use the powers you accumulated. Use your memory and try to be as fast as possible. But donâ€™t touch the walls of the maze. Collect all letters from each maze themes to increase the challenge. The mazes are randomly generated and increase in size as you complete them. Your memory and speed as the key elements of these puzzles. The number of different mazes is infinite! Earn a maximum of points in order to unlock the different available themes to personalize your maze and your player. Try to score the highest possible and compare with your friends and players worldwide!
